extName.message: Bu mmuae fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho

extDescription.message: Ka adeɛ a wɔde ka ho a edikan no ho otomatik wɔ email mmuae mu.

composeTitle.message: Bu mmuae fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho

optionsTitle.message: Bu mmuae fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho — Nhyehyɛe

confirmTitle.message: Sɔ adeɛ a wɔde ka ho mu

uiHeader.message: Bu mmuae fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho

uiNoOptions.message: Seesei de, nnhyehyɛe bi nni hɔ a wobɛtumi asesa.

uiSupport.message: Wopɛ add-on yi? Mesrɛ wo, boa me de akyɛdeɛ ketewa bi:

uiRateATNText.message: Mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ w’adwene wɔ ATN

uiDonateSnoozed.message: Meda wo ase! Yɛde akyɛdeɛ kɔkɔbɔ no asie ma nna 90.

uiDonateRestored.message: Akyɛdeɛ kɔkɔbɔ no ada adi bio.

uiGithubText.message: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wobɔ amanneɛ fa mfomso anaa nsɛmmisa foforo ho a, mesrɛ wo, kɔ me

iconAlt.message: Aikɔn Bu mmuae fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Fael biara a ne din hyia pattern biara wɔ ha no, wɔrenka ho otomatik da. Lain baako mu, pattern baako. Mfatoho: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Bɔ me kɔkɔ sɛ blacklist ayi adeɛ a wɔde ka ho afi ho

uiConfirmLabel.message: Bisa ansa na wobɛka adeɛ a wɔde ka ho ho

uiConfirmHelp.message: Kakraa bi a ɛyɛ sɔ mu bɛda adi kɛkɛ bere a wɔbɛka adeɛ a wɔde ka ho ampa. Keyboard: Y anaa J = Aane; N anaa Esc = Daabi.

confirmAddOne.message: Fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho ka ho: $1?

confirmAddMany.message: Fa adeɛ a wɔde ka ho ka ho ($1): $2$3?

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Fael a ɛdi so yi renka ho otomatik:
